response.overview: South Africa is one of the last natural homes of the iconic African lion. However, these majestic cats have an enemy against which they have no defense - human greed. Lions are the embodiment of power and status. And those willing to pay enough can easily get their hands on this coveted trophy. Why hunt a dangerous predator when you can simply poison it? Contaminated shows the suffering a lion endures when it is poisoned and celebrates the dedicated individuals who throw everything into the fight to protect this species.
response.title: Besmet
